intro.title: Open Source Project Focused on Bitcoin Education
intro.description: Bitcoin Primer helps you comprehensively understand Bitcoin's essence, technical principles, and social significance through multidisciplinary perspectives.

item1.title: Non-Profit
item1.description: Pure public education project, no participation in any commissions, promotions, or commercial activities.

item2.title: Objective and Fair
item2.description: Based on facts and academic research, no exaggerated promotion, no profit through false information.

item3.title: Bitcoin-Only
item3.description: Focus only on Bitcoin, not involving other cryptocurrencies, contract trading, or high-risk investments.

item4.title: Open and Transparent
item4.description: Fully open source code, free knowledge sharing, welcome community contributions.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: The project is fully open source, welcoming everyone to contribute. Whether you're a developer, educator, or Bitcoin enthusiast, you can help us improve this educational platform by submitting code, improving content, or providing suggestions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any questions, suggestions, or collaboration intentions, please feel free to contact us via email.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This website content is for educational reference only and does not constitute investment advice. Bitcoin price is highly volatile, please invest rationally at your own risk.
